abstract: Robert Wolf, a former chairman of UBS, was expected to formally announce on Monday the hiring of several executives for his firm, 32 Advisors, including former members of the Obama administration.
snippet: Robert Wolf, a former chairman of UBS, was expected to formally announce on Monday the hiring of several executives for his firm, 32 Advisors, including former members of the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: During his 29-year career on Wall Street, Robert Wolf has amassed a contact list full of boldface names from the worlds of finance and politics, up to and including President Obama.

headline.main: Longtime Wall Street Deal Maker Expands Advisory Firm
headline.print_headline: An Advisory Firm Expands, Drawing on Obama Contacts

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
